Ober Cheaver

Web Developer

Howdy! Here's a tad bit about me: My name is Ober and I graduated from Fable College summa cum laude. My girlfriend Maxine, who loves playing Whack-A-Mole, taught me everything I know about JavaScript. She'd place stickers with technical jargon over each mole and told me to "Just whack it. It'll stick!" And because of this my brothers from the Zeta Beta Max fraternity compare me to that of a really smart Apple watch. I like to eat German Chocolate Cake with a glass of milk on Sundays and drink Kombucha Tea on Tuesdays.

See my profile on LinkedIn.

Side Projects

Harry's Hamburgers

CSS / JavaScript / Firebase

2018

This project started as contact form but has evolved into a hamburger joint. It's a bit of a free form project at this point. For the form to send properly, I used JavaScript and the DOM and created a database with Google Firebase. I tried to make a case for jQuery, so that's why I threw in the Menu.

Key Project Skills:

  • CSS Animations
  • JavaScript & The DOM
  • Google Firebase

Coffee Shop

Bootstrap 4 / jQuery / Brevity

2019

Wait. What? Another restaurant site? But you've already got Harry's Hamburgers, you say. Yep, not really my intention but that's what happened. Guess I got's myself Bootstrapped. Perhaps I'll convert it to an ecommerce site later on. I hear's nowadays that's what they wanna see.

Key Project Skills:

  • Bootstrap 4
  • jQuery
  • HTML 5

Resume In Technicolor

FLOATS / FLEXBOX / FUNGAI

2019

An all in one smorgasbord of floats, flexbox and fungai! My initial intention was to create a useful resume. But I soon found out that employers don't care too much for this one. This is still a work in progress and I've learned a few things such as matching typography fonts that go together well but also contrast. I learned different ways of using Flexbox and still find myself changing it up. It's beautiful, man!

Key Project Skills:

  • HTML 5/CSS/Typography
  • Flexbox Navigation
  • Responsive Design
